bgDescription: One of the famous field recipes of the Midnight Rangers, carefully selected Lemongrass and Raw Meat are combined for barbecue. Later adaptations transformed it into a stew, where Lemongrass's fragrance adeptly masks the gamey flavor of the meat, contributing to its widespread popularity.
description: Increases Echo drop rate by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases Echo drop rate by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
